newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malayawata sets venture with Micron.
newsitem.headline: Malayawata sets venture with Micron.

text.p: Malayawata Steel Bhd said that it and Japan's Micron Co Ltd propose to form a joint venture, Harimic Malaysia Sdn Bhd, which will make and market spherical silica powders for the semiconductor industry.

The venture will have an initial paid up capital of 11.25 million ringgit with Malayawata holding an initial 10 percent equity, the company said in a statement sent to the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange on Thursday.
Malayawata has an option to further increase its shareholding to 25 percent. After the exercise of this option, the venture's capital would rise to 13.5 million ringgit.
The venture will market the spherical silica powders to the semiconductor industries in Southeast Asia through Micron's sales network, the statement said.
